overview: From the creators of Lalaoopsy comes a "Sew Magical Tale"! Now, for the very first time, journey beyond the rolling green hills of Lalaoopsy Land to a magical place never seen before where you'll meet the Lala-Oopsies! On islands that float on strawberry milk rivers, surrounded by tall mushroom trees, live the whimsical Lala-Oopsies princess ballerinas, fairies and mermaids. Join them as they embark on a fantastical journey to save their precious homes when the strawberry milk, which powers Lala-Oopsies Land, suddenly stops flowing.
tagline: Enter the Magical Land of Lala-oopsies in This Movie Adventure!
title: Lala-oopsies A Sew Magical Tale
